step1.title: Paste your Vinted URL
step1.description: Enter the URL of your Vinted item in this field to automatically extract all photos

step2.title: Or upload a photo
step2.description: Click this button to directly upload a photo from your device

step3.title: Extract images
step3.description: After pasting the URL, click here to retrieve all photos from the Vinted item

step4.title: Configure your AI avatar
step4.description: Customize the characteristics of your virtual model (gender, morphology, pose, etc.)

step5.title: Generate your worn photo
step5.description: Once everything is configured, click here to start generating your photo with AI
